name: A Leap Of Faith (HolographicQuad)
description:
This little frog is far away from home, and dusk is approaching. With the help of fireflies, help him return safely. But beware, the swamp is dangerous at night.

Controls:

Move  - WASD  

Jump - SPACE / SHIFT

Eat FireFlies - LEFT CLICK 

Use of the limitation
Fireflies will only glow for a few seconds in the belly of the frog before completely dimming.  Get across the pond before that happens.

This game was created for the Mini Jam #106. 

Theme - Frogs

Created with Godot engine 

Art created with Aseprite

Programming - Maryam Waites

Art - Asiyah Ward

Music  - Dezphos Youtube Channel

This was our first game jam and completed game ever. Thanks!

( sorry for any bugs!)
